Pre-Game Insights: India and Pakistan are undefeated in the World Cup with two comprehensive victories each
India is third on the World Cup standings with four points and a net run-rate of 1.5
Pakistan is in fourth also with four points and a net run-rate of 0.927
The match is expected to be a clash for the ages with more than 100,000 spectators at Narendra Modi Stadium, Ahmedabad
India skipper Rohit Sharma has been the ground's top run-scorer in ODIs since 2010
The conditions have generally favored fast bowlers with 59% of the wickets at the venue prior to this year's World Cup
Jasprit Bumrah and Mohammed Siraj are set to go head-to-head with Shaheen Shah Afridi, Haris Rauf, and Hasan Ali
